title: Moon Lovers: Scarlet Heart Ryeo
resume: Scarlet Heart: Ryeo is the remake of Chinese drama Bu Bu Jing Xin that stars IU as a woman who gets time-warped back to the Goryeo dynasty, and becomes involved with a very large family of princes, some of whom are vying for the throne, or her affections, or both.

Login to create it. en Login Sign Up  ID: 66433   Expand Moon Lovers: Scarlet Heart Ryeo   (2016) User Score  Play Trailer Overview Scarlet Heart: Ryeo is the remake of Chinese drama Bu Bu Jing Xin that stars IU as a woman who gets time-warped back to the Goryeo dynasty, and becomes involved with a very large family of princes, some of whom are vying for the throne, or her affections, or both. The programs that have this rating may include moderate or strong adult themes, language, sexual inference, and violence.
